org.jinq.jpa

Class JPQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jinq.jpa.JPQL

  • public class JPQL
extends Object
    Provides Java implementations of certain JPQL functions.

      JPQL()

    • Method Detail

      • like

        public static boolean like(String str,
                           String pattern)
        In-memory implementation of JPQL like.
        Parameters:
        str - string to search inside
        pattern - pattern to look for inside string (uses JPQL/SQL like syntax)
        Returns:
        true iff the pattern in found in the string

      • like

        public static boolean like(String str,
                           String pattern,
                           String escapeChar)
        In-memory implementation of JPQL like.
        Parameters:
        str - string to search inside
        pattern - pattern to look for inside string (uses JPQL/SQL like syntax)
        escapeChar - escape character that can be used to escape the special _ and % used in the pattern syntax
        Returns:
        true iff the pattern in found in the string

      • isInList

        public static <U> Boolean isInList(U item,
                                   Collection<U> list)
        Checks if an item is in a Collection list. This method is normally used with the list as a parameter to the query.
        Parameters:
        item - object that will be checked to see if it is in list
        list - Collection of different items
        Returns:
        true if the item is in the list

      • isIn

        Variation of the method isInList() that works on JinqStreams
        See Also:
        #isInList()

        See Also:
